post.body: Perhaps you should check the insides of your eyelids for leaks... very carefully... :-)
LOL Tepid Topics! :-)
The corners of the mouth generally turn upwards when an individual is smiling & reaches the eyes when the smile is genuine... Next!
Depends on motives and circumstances, I would think.
How about a smile? Those fit everyone's faces! :-)
Being sick is evil by the sounds of it! Get well soon! :-)
Safe journey :-)
Not exactly unique to you though is it, this serious avatar? :-) Sure I've seen it before! What's wrong with your own physog? :-)
Sometimes I despair of the human race ever managing to shake off the savagery that lies just beneath the skin of every one of us.
Some call it 'being ecomomical with the truth'...
My last tweet was a response to your previous tweet. I agree entirely that governments should not react to terrorism violently.
I have to differ slightly on that one. For this to become one world, one people, all within it must be acknowledged by everyone.
is that so? The trick is to want what you can get! :-) No, actually, the real trick is to want what you already have :-)
We also remember that terrible disaster and the suffering of those poor people. That is not to diminish the suffering in Mumbai.
Well good on you! Was that addressed to whoever wore the cap that fitted it? No takers here :-)
Go on, go on, just taunt me with your goodies & see if I care! I just ate a fabulous brie omelette the capitano made, so there! :-)
I always thought that was a volcano... :-)
Good morning! Hope he's a good patient :-) Morning @JohnMarsden ! Good morning @MichaelLawver
Aww... first the rehearsals and then, if all goes well, the reruns :-) Hope you like carols! :-)
It would take longer than the time left to run to get through the dispute process, surely?
You're killing me here! Coconut is another of my passions! How about apple and blackberry? Butterscotch.... Revenge is sweet :-)
Your hat's pretty cool too!
But still a star to all your followers! :-)
Everyone should have one! Don't tell anyone but I'm in the holiday spirit all year round! :-)
Aged 35 I bought my 20th dispenser! The first candy in my shopping mall was PEZ - you have exposed a half-century-long fan! :-)
Going to share the whole list of suggestions with us then? :-)
Where did you manage to hide PEZ for 7 years without weakening and eating them?! :-)
'Nothing' is , apparently, very slimming! :-))
Mmm I've never even heard of bread and butter pudding ice cream! Robbie makes the b&b pudding in winter and I absolutely love it!
LOL
@NixTheNews is fun
Support... you mean like: "Walk behind me on the way to the restaurant, please, so nobody can see my rear view!" :-)
I was torn between that and rum & raisin but mint chocolate chip always wins in the end :-)
Have you noticed how many doctors are heavy smokers too?
http://familycrafts.about.com/cs/pineconecrafts/a/102300a.htm A few nice ideas there :-)
Did Descartes mention how keen some people were to see him put to death for daring to have thoughts of his own?!
You're very brave! Whenever we comment on how well anything on board is working, almost without fail, it stops within minutes! :-)
Well, you're breathing... that's doing something... although, admittedly, it's not doing much :-)
I enjoyed myself there, thanks! I left you a blurb as well!
Hiya! I'll go and look at your new Top 10 page now over at http://tinyurl.com/6qphlb
Have a fun adventure!
Hope you're wrapped up warm! See you later!
Good morning (or evening in my case) to you! Seas calm, no wind at all - we've had a lovely sunny day! How is it over there?
I like the answer... but what was the question? :-)
Sorry I missed your last tweet... I thought the pic was great, just the way it was! :-)
So sorry - I don't know what this refers to and I've got to go now! Maybe tomorrow? That would be great,,,
It doesn't have to be routine - one could just say that this week what will earn the allowance is X activity. Worked on me!
Night Charles! Sweet dreams!
Yay!
Wonder what the view of your window from the moon is like... :-)
Further to earlier: if you're into flagellation, necrophilia and equestrianism you may well be flogging a dead horse!
Don't tell me I bored you to sleep with the last one? Or did I snap your synapses? :-)
It's great when pets finally get the fact that there's enough love in the household to go round and then some :-)
It may mean the person you want to talk to isn't following you back :-) Silly person, whoever it is! :-)
graps? Try grabs ! :-)
What else is up for graps, besides the gingerbread soaps?
Have a great night! Hope to see you tomorrow sometime :-)
Handy to have a nice shiny new one just in time for the holiday!
My pleasure! Everyone should try your great goodies :-)
Night night! Sweet dreams :-)
Get out of that and stay fashionable! :-)
A sparkling smorgasbord of scintillating spuriousness...
It means I ReTweeted (or repeated) your message to the other 1521, no 1522, no... people in the Twitterhood :-)
What's in a Pink Paradise?
Jewelry is so hard on the teeth and digestion though... couldn't we have cookies and cake at the party instead? Good night! :-)
Don't you go labelling me! I'm a veritable human!
My pleasure! (Sorry I couldn't DM you back as you're not a neighbour in the Twitterhood i.e. you don't follow me) Cheers!
Maybe you need to spell it out early on that you can only help people if they're willing to give complete answers to your questions
Are you rehearsing possible answers to major questions or will you wing it?
Hope you didn't mind my pruning your tweet there so I could retweet it!
Not sure I actually ever knew what business you're in - I'm too lazy to visit your profile again either... what is it?
The skipper has just handed me a steaming mug of tea, too... Cheers!
Santa hats courtesy of @JaimieH - follow her and she'll soon have you clad in festive headgear!
Another impeccably festive Santa hat - my monitor screen is ablaze with holiday spirit... Yay!
That Santa hat looks just so cool on you! I can't get over it!
Sleep tweetly! :-)
I´ve never heard of TweetGrid! What does it do?
The latter choice of tag lines sounds warmer so I prefer it :-)
My you're in a jolly mood today! Not. :-)
How's the weather up your way?
So... I am on the mini notebook and will have to leave the Twitterhood pretty soon and save the battery for emergencies. Boo!
Hi there! The rain is beating incessantly on the coachroof! The aux generator just ground to a halt - guess it´s too damp!
Me too and although it helps a lot it's still easy to become overwhelmed by quantity!
Is it Wednesday? I'm doing absent-mindedly by the sounds of it! Good to hear your day started well - hope it continues thus
You speak for yourself! Frumpies? You're moving in the wrong circles if you think frumpies are the only social media users! :-)
Such is life! :-) Hope you have a lovely day at work and get a chance to pop into the Twitterhood every now and again...
LOL BTW what do you think of the movie previews in the mall's cinema or haven't you discovered that yet (off the basement foyer)?
Nighty night! Sleep well! :-)
You're too kind!
Santa is often depicted using a ladder in Spain!
Yes thanks, apart from the freezing cold! How about you?
That's very cheering to hear! Have you seen the Christmas iTunes department? I think I might have out-festived myself there!
Long ago, if baby wasn't settling, people used to put the crib near a pendulum clock, metronome or slow music at calm heart rate
No sound that simulates a heartbeat though?
@JesseNewhart Ah, that's a different matter in that sense I sincerely believe Twitter will outstrip all other online media.
Sorry about delays - Internet & Twitter taking it in turns to poop out! It's very cold tonight and clear skies with big moon :-)
Have you ever tried puttingan audibly ticking clock near baby?
I don't think Twitter will dwarf blogging - so much can't be said in 140 characters - Twitter & Blogger will coexist
No, it's light-hearted fun and I am getting tired of knockers, people who think decrying what others do makes them appear clever
LOL
Are you asleep yet? LOL
What is with the grim you avatar?! Is that the you we are to share? I'd much rather see you at your smiling best! :-)
The full sentence should have been "Thank you for your support... I'll always wear it!" Surely:-)
The more mistakes we make, the less there are to go :-)
Well I'm just going to have to forgive you then, aren't I?! You're a fast learner and that's always good :-) ...
You really are excited aren't you?! You just tweeted that twice! LOL
So sorry for your loss but grateful that your Step Father passed gently. Consider yourself hugged :-)
Nighty night! Nice to know there is someone good around here LOL
Thank you! I'll take a look at that. I 'm learning so many new things in so many directions I feel like Lilu in The 5th Element LOL
He should have explained and let me decide. The decision would have been: no, sorry, I won't use people or help you do so!
Yes, he does - he says it's an app he's launching soon and that's fine but I object to being duped into helping him create a buzz
Always! If anyone says they's like to be introduced or a follower of theirs to be introduced I always do it and Nick knows that!
Hiya! How are you today?
Nick could have asked me publicly to shout out for that name instead of going via DM to do it - it is that which makes me cross
Thank goodness for that! I racked my brains as to why not have a quiz, apart from tweets cluttering the Twitter interface!
Is that an answer to the milf enquiry? Oh dear!
Wossa milf????
Do the maths, forget the red herrings :-)
You've gone very quiet :-)
http://www.codeweavers.com/services/ports/chromium/ takes you to the other OS open source substitute...
I agree!
Oh, I see... I would imagine you are standing...
What's wrong with http://www.google.com/chrome then? Are you on XP/Vista? If not it may not be any use to you...
Unfortunately, your answer is incorrect...
Who or what, sitting or standing?
Hold on... I'm working on it :-)
Not to worry - it hasn't stopped you reflecting and what else is a mirror any good for apart from signalling in an emergency?
What, now you're practising to become a mirror? Is there any end to your talents.?
Great athlete but lousy riddle solver... in one graceful bound he was gone... how romantic! :-)
Twitterhood Riddle #1 coming up...
Seems Eric is going to have his crown and eat it! LOL
RT @Foodimentary: Food~Quote: My doctor told me to stop having intimate dinners for four; unless there are three other people. ~Orson Welles
RT@OmegaSuperfoods I found this. Hope it helps.http://tinyurl.com/5sesue
RT @JaimieH: snowballing into a great way to share in holiday spirit~anyone else for a santa hat? Free or $1.50 donation for tudiabetes.com
Welcome to the Twitterhood new tweeple - I think I've successfully unfollowed enough non-followers to follow you all back!
RT@schieldenver Publish your book. Unsolicited manuscripts welcome. www.schieldenver.com.
Hello again tweeple of the Twitterhood! Hope everyone is having the best possible time... Just ploughing through my inbox... aaaargh!
Time I was not here tweeple... must shut down the inverter or risk the wrath of the skipper when he finds I've overdone it! Night night all!
RT @jiblethead: RT @hthrflynn: Last twt before bed: Please vote for LoCoMusings, in the blog brawl at VARBuzz.com before 8 am est tmorrow!
RT @TenDigitGifts: More gingerbread soap available http://tinyurl.com/69ywmh
RT @sherikayehoff: Constant prayers for a family who has lost their son.
Come on everybody! Lets help her reach her goal: @TenDigitGifts: Five sales away from reaching 700!! :)
Welcome lovely new followers! Free to share: twitteroid's guide to Mastering Twitter in 10 Minutes or Less at http://www.linnetwoods.com
RT @rocketrobin2: @linnetwoods my main franchise opportunity website is http:www.domesticcleaningfranchise.co.uk
OK! I've got to skedaddle! Back later... if this rain will stop for a while and let us get the generator going! Bye for now!
Hey everyone! Have you met @rocketrobin2 yet?!
RT @danfreeman: attention small business owners - please answer my quick 3 question survey (less than 30 seconds). http://twurl.nl/015f32
RT @TraciKnoppe: For those w/ fibro or chronic illness; helpful homekeeping lists: http://budurl.com/27yr created by @christianhome
RT @NixTheNews: If you haven't tried SPELLING BEE at http://TweeterBreak.com, you're missing lots of fun! Yes, it's addicting :)
RT @justin_hart Hey... help us get 100 @chuckdevore donations in the next 24 hrs: http://tweetforchuck.com
Just dropped into the Twitterhood for a few minutes to welcome new followers! Free Twitter guide @ http://www.linnetwoods.com share with all
RT @JerryRoberts: Looking for good Wordpress coder who does quick and reliable work. My needs are not extreme. English skills important.
Ladies and gentletweeple: I've had a great time here tonight but I'm yawning so hugely that I may turn inside out, so I'm off! Night night!
Got to go! As soon as I can I will be back in the Twitterhood. Anyone who'd like the rest of the Twitterhood to know they´re here, DM me :-)
RT @PeopleForEarth: Any chance that you nominate @PeopleForEarth http://shortyawards.com/category/green ?
RT @Jimconnolly: My friend, the business expert Stuart Ramsay @stuartramsay is definitely worth following for great business advice!
RT @artbyskym: 30% off! Art collectors specials http://tinyurl.com/6xvs8n
RT @DanTanner: I just joined the smm Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/smm and you can too. Please Retweet.
RT @bizziemommy: I just posted my wordless wends, pic would love to know what everyone thinks. http://www.bizziemommy.com/
RT @PlusSizeMommy: I'm collecting book donations for my kids school, they're in desperate need of books for the library, shelves are empty,
RT@BigManWalking Hi! Just posted plz retweet? http://tinyurl.com/BMW777171 LOST 13 lbs 10 days! Healthy method. UCAN2 or a friend!
RT @davemunger: Sign the Every Human has rights pledge: http://everyhumanhasrights.org/
Ladies and gentletweeple of the Twitterhood: I bid you goodnight and must be away to the aft cabin to get warm :-) Tweet you tomorrow!
RT @naturalpod: Two thinkbaby sets are being given away over at www.zrecs.com if you subscribe: http://tinyurl.com/6x5fwl
So how does everyone without a chimney handle the Santa thing?
Have you seen my Christmas Annexe yet? http://tinyurl.com/6acf84 Soon there will be something under the tree for you!
RT @pattidigh: "The novel is a pack of lies hounding the truth." -Carlos Fuentes
RT @WarrenWhitlock: @BillHibbler of http://cli.gs/au is on #TCR He shows people how to make money with affiliate marketing. Join us now
RT @JesseNewhart: RT @lizstrauss: Does anyone know anything about Truemanity? http://is.gd/br38
RT @artbyskym: MAKE ME AN OFFER DAY http://tinyurl.com/6xvs8n Pick from the Gallery http://picasaweb.google.com/artbyskyM/ArtBySkyM
RT @EmperorNorton: I just added a link to Twitter Group http://twittgroups.com/group/bipolars so be sure to look for it. Please Retweet.
RT @EmperorNorton: New Twitter group for bipolar sufferers --> http://twittgroups.com/group/bipolars
RT @artbyskym: My gallery http://tinyurl.com/6kzohm
Hey everyone! Have you met @TheMarque yet? He's a cool guy to know!
Congratulations to @Ramona_W for winning a WordPress Weblog Award http://weblogawards.wordpress.com/2008/12/29/mouthfeel A proud day for us!
Hey everyone! Have you met @Forian yet? A follow is the finest form of greeting! :-)
In how many moves will you reach a door if you are eight feet away from it and with each move you advance half the distance to the door?
